author: asianlego
title: Chunky People
review: The 'people' in this bucket weren't minifigs but rather chunky people with a large 4x2 wide base and 2x2 studs on their heads with sloped sides. (Picture above for reference). Both their heads and bodies were the same size. This used to amuse me very much last time as I thought that it was crazy to put these people beside my regular size minifigs. This set also came with windows, wheels, vehicle chassis, car windshields, propellers, and a giant load of regular bricks.
